title: My First Blog Post
content: My first day of Codeup. I already feel lost in the sauce!.  I wonder what it will be ike in a month?  I will have to ensure to study harder. I hope it gets better. We are starting with Javascript... I have been studying HTML and CSS, so...  Anyways I will keep everyone posted.

title: The Second Post
content: Having troubles with Loops, Arrays, and Objects. I had to re-take the assessment. It doesnt make me feel better about the situation but the more I code the better I feel. I am jsut not as sharp or fast as the young men and women in this class. The thing that surprises me is how the young students are mroe than happy to help. It gives me faith in the next generation.

title: The Third Post
